modules.description: Dual sequencer and clock divider. Panel by jk.

modules.name: Divide & Conquer
modules.description: More clock dividers than you will ever need.

modules.name: Neuron
modules.description: 3-input comparator and Difference Rectifier for creating unpredictable interactions. Panel by jk.

modules.name: Numberwang
modules.description: Four gates make sixteen. That's Numberwang! Panel by jk.

modules.name: Router
modules.description: Simple switch. If the CV input is below the knob voltage setting, the output is active. Panel by jk.

modules.name: Segue
modules.description: Stereo channel-flipping panner, crossfader, or VCA
